mapper.sql: id, good_name, customer_id, sku, specification_model, available_stock, lock_stock, create_user, create_time, remarks
mapper.select:
select igor.id ,s.good_name goodName, s.customer_id customerId, s.sku, s.specification_model specificationModel, l.location_code locationCode, ((select un_delivered_quantity from goods_location_record g where g.ku_code = glr.ku_code and g.inGood_id = glr.inGood_id and g.type=1)) inventoryQuantityUnit, (select DISTINCT a.createTime from (select create_time createTime,ku_code kuCode from goods_location_record g where type = 1 group by ku_code) a where exists (select 1 from (select create_time createTime,ku_code kuCode from goods_location_record g where type = 1 group by ku_code) b where b.kuCode = a.kuCode and b.createTime >= a.createTime )) updateTime from location l left join warehouse_area_shelves_location wasl on l.location_id = wasl.id left join goods_location_record glr on l.location_code = glr.ku_code and glr.type = 1 left join in_goods_operation_record igor on glr.inGood_id = igor.id left join stock s on igor.sku = s.sku where l.status = 0
and glr.ku_code like concat('%',#{form.kuCode},'%')
and s.sku like concat('%',#{form.sku},'%')
and s.`customer_id` in
#{customerId}
